a.title: Continuous Learning, virtual learning at home begins April 7, 2020. Click anywhere in the banner picture for more information.

img.alt: Continuous Learning, virtual learning at home begins April 7, 2020. Click anywhere in the banner picture for more information.

a.title: Feeding our kids update. Starting after April 20, 2020 grab n go meals will be provided Monday through Thursday, with days worth of meals being provided on Thursday for Friday meals.

img.alt: Feeding our kids update. Starting after April 20, 2020 grab n go meals will be provided Monday through Thursday, with days worth of meals being provided on Thursday for Friday meals.

The Alamogordo Public School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, gender, marital status, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The Alamogordo Public School District does not discriminate in its hiring or other employment practices.
See Notice of Non-Discrimination for complete information.
